subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
Stuttering
lead_paragraph: Although he is the tallest person to play Grand Slam tennis, Ivo Karlovic is attracting more attention at the moment for short messages. But then Karlovic has long been a man of surprising contrasts.
snippet: Although he is the tallest person to play Grand Slam tennis, Ivo Karlovic is attracting more attention at the moment for short messages. But then Karlovic has long been a man of surprising contrasts.
